attributes.action: I want a salford Royal Hospital to have a maternity ward again.
attributes.additional_details: I want you s to help set a petition up and help fund the money to get Salfors Royal Hospitl back to have a maternity and delivery unit.
attributes.background: Their are too many women struggling to get to hospitals when in labour, due to it being a deprived area and people struggle to afford to get hospital out of the area. Also I want you to look into the studies that children in the salford area have more disabilities, due to complicated labour

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local NHS services are a matter for the local integrated care board, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are concerned about healthcare in your area you can find our local integrated care board (ICB) here: https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-services/find-your-local-integrated-care-board/
